Package com.mimecast.robin.smtp.verb

Class Verb

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.smtp.verb.Verb
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthVerb, BdatVerb, EhloVerb, MailVerb
public class Verb extends Object
SMTP verb.

This implements the basic parsing for SMTP verbs.
